tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE carbon_offset_credits (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  carbon_credits INT NOT NULL,
  offset_date DATE NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE renewable_energy_projects (
 id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name TEXT NOT NULL,
 project_type TEXT NOT NULL,
 start_date DATE NOT NULL,
 end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE carbon_offset_credits (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  offset_credits DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  start_date DATE NOT NULL,
  end_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  capacity DECIMAL NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE project (
   project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
   start_date DATE,
   end_date DATE,
   total_credits DECIMAL
);
